name: DeviantRevert
description:
Don't like the new style of DeviantArt and wish they would change it back? Don't worry, i got you covered.
I threw this together in a couple of hours, it makes the best of the situation and changes the icon placement of the top bar to closely resemble how it used to look.

This style should also be compatible with most other styles
additional_info:
Coded and tested on Chrome/Win7. Works with several different styles for dA, including classicSYMBOL and deviantART Infinity.
If you want to report a bug, suggest a feature/change or anything then please contact me on my DeviantArt http://heartfire-art.deviantart.com/ 

v1.0 - Initial Release
v1.1 - Update for new DeviantArt design changes
v1.2 - Tweaked the login and join buttons and a border
v1.3 - Fixed quite a massive glitch that made it impossible to edit deviations with the style enabled and reverted coloring of the Submit button
v1.3.1 - Fixed glitch caused by previous update
